summary: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.
cast: Bérénice Bejo|Ali Mosaffa|Tahar Rahim|Pauline Burlet|Elyes Aguis|Jeanne Jestin|Sabrina Ouazani|Babak Karimi|Valeria Cavalli|Aleksandra Klebanska|Jean-Michel Simonet|Pierre Guerder|Anne-Marion de Cayeux|Eléonora Marino|Jonathan Devred|Sylviane Fraval|Alireza Abbasi|Mahshid Khosravi|Michèle Raingeval
title: El pasado
